title: Looking for Morning Queue duo buddy.
body:
I play every morning from 9 am to 2 pm. Could use some company, prefer a jungler but open to all roles cept supp. 

Plat 3 +

replies.body: Add me, FBI hood. plat 5 alt with plat 2 mmr :) Play pretty much every day
add me killmysupport, i play a lot of ADC and JG im on weekends and aftert work on weekdays, plat 3
